name: Antediluvian
description:
Antediluvian is a retro-inspired FPS set in a mansion overrun by an evil cult. Using a selection of weapons and the powerful Necronomicon, you must fight your way through the cult's forces to destroy their leader. But beware: their deranged calls to the dark gods echo through the halls, and you never know what might be listening...

Credits:
Project Lead/ AI Design: Alan Boyle
Game Designer: Kyle Taylor (@KyleTaylorGD)
Game Designer: Matthew Barrett (https://matthewjbarrett.wixsite.com/mjbgamedesign)
Level Design: Natalie Cooper (@Ameglow)
Art Lead: Joe Johnson (https://www.artstation.com/joe_johnson)
Character Artist: Albie Sothcott (https://albion_sothcott.artstation.com/)
Environment Artist: Ross Hankinson (https://www.artstation.com/rosshankinson)
Environment Artist: Tyler Hartshorne (https://www.artstation.com/tylersabine)
Prop Artist: Jay Reece (https://www.artstation.com/jay_3d_makes)
Animator: Robyn McCord

Magic effects from Advanced Magic FX 12 https://www.unrealengine.com/marketplace/en-US/product/advanced-magic-fx-11
